name: Morph Facility
description:
Morph your way through the facility and solve puzzles by changing the shapes of the glowing boxes with your awesome morph gun.

Controls:
Move: WASD
Look Around: Mouse
Shoot projectile: LMB
Pickup object/box: RMB
Jump: Space

Team Name: Papertrail Games 

Team Members: 

Vegard Lundestad Hammer, Magnus Grønningen
